title: Waf Overrides
description: Overrides for turning WAF packages on or off

links.title: List URI-controlled WAF configurations
links.description: List the WAF configurations on a zone.

per_page.description: Number of WAF configurations per page

links.title: Create a URI-controlled WAF configuration
links.description: Create a new WAF configuration for a zone. See the record object definitions for required attributes for each record type.
links.curl:
curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/firewall/waf/overrides" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"description":"Enable Cloudflare Magento ruleset for shop.example.com","urls":["shop.example.com/*"],"priority":1,"groups":{"ea8687e59929c1fd05ba97574ad43f77":"default"},"rules":{"100015":"disable"},"rewrite_action":{"default":"block","challenge":"block","simulate":"disable"}}'

paused.description: Whether this package is currently paused

description.description: A note that you can use to describe the purpose of this configuration.

urls.description: URLs to be included in this rule definition. Wildcards are permitted. The URL pattern entered here will be escaped before use. This limits the URL to just simple wildcard patterns.

priority.description: Relative priority of this configuration when multiple configurations match a single URL. Higher priority configurations may overwrite values set by lower priority configurations.

groups.description: Enable or disable WAF rule groups. The keys of this object are WAF rule group IDs and the values must be a valid WAF action (usually default or disable). When creating a new URI-controlled WAF configuration either `groups` or `rules` must be provided at a minimum.

rules.description: Change the action assigned to a WAF rule. The keys of this object are WAF rule IDs and the values must be a valid WAF action. Unless disabling the rule, ensure that you also enable the rule group that this WAF rule belongs to. When creating a new URI-controlled WAF configuration either `groups` or `rules` must be provided at a minimum.

rewrite_action.description: When a WAF rule matches, substitute its configured action for a different action specified by this object.

links.title: URI-controlled WAF configuration details
Update URI-controlled WAF configuration
links.curl:
curl -X PUT "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/zones/023e105f4ecef8ad9ca31a8372d0c353/firewall/waf/overrides/de677e5818985db1285d0e80225f06e5" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"description":"Enable Cloudflare Magento ruleset for shop.example.com","urls":["shop.example.com/*"],"priority":1,"groups":{"ea8687e59929c1fd05ba97574ad43f77":"default"},"rules":{"100015":"disable"},"rewrite_action":{"default":"block","challenge":"block","simulate":"disable"}}'

When creating a new URI-controlled WAF configuration either `groups` or `rules` must be provided at a minimum.

cfLinkErrors.10002: lockdown rule not unique (edit the existing rather than adding a new)
cfLinkErrors.10015: Patch value not valid for given context
